Posts.Content: On 8/17/2007 Honolulu wrote: I have an acquaintance with a history of breast cancer who now has a third occurance and the doctor says that it is "triple negative breast cancer". Does anyone know about this form of breast cancer, cancer centers or doctors that specialize in it or new treatnments? Thanks.   Wayne   Hi, I just wanted to let you know that there is a foundation devoted to research on Triple Negative Breast Cancer and support of those who have it. It is the Triple Negative Breast Cancer Foundation - Here is the link. http://www.tnbcfoundation.org/tnbc/About_TNBC.asp Best of luck to your friend
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Breast Cancer
